title: House of Phineas
description: In Book 2 of Gladiators, Gold is sold and he and Samson are parted.Gold begins a new life at the House of Phineas, where he lives a more luxurious life, gets to fight again in the arena, and is subjected to many erotic adventures.Although he lusts after a slave who is denied him, his heart belongs to Samson, whom he believes he will never see again.Then Simeon, his former master, who laments his loss of Gold, sets up a contest for him to fight his own champion, Samson.Will Gold be able to kill his own heart in the arena?Reader This book contains some BDSM and ménage à trois scenes.
author: D.J. Manly
